author: The Associated Press
title: Egypt announces 2-week, night-time curfew
content:
DUBAI, United Arab Emirates Egypt has announced a two-week, 7 p.m. to 6 a.m. curfew for its over 100 million people to slow the spread of the new coronavirus.
Prime Minister Moustafa Madbouly told a news conference on Tuesday that the 11-hour curfew would go… [+5498 chars]
